content: विसर्जनं {@--1@} Emitting, sending forth, pouring down; समतया वसुवृष्टिविसर्जनैः <ls>R. 9. 6.</ls> {@--2@} Giving away, a gift, donation; <ls>R. 9. 6.</ls> {@--3@} Voiding; <ls>Ms. 4. 48.</ls> {@--4@} Casting off, quitting, abandoning; श्रुतदेहविसर्जनः पितुः <ls>R. 8. 25.</ls> {@--5@} Sending away, dismissal. {@--6@} Allowing (the deity invoked) to go (<ab>opp.</ab> आवाहन). {@--7@} Setting a bull at liberty on certain occasions.
